alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 13 at 12:30PM PDT until April 14 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures between 30 and 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Central Douglas County and Jackson County. This includes the cities of Roseburg Sutherland, Elkton, Drain, Scottsburg, Camas Valley, Azalea, Shady Cove, Rogue River, Jacksonville, Applegate, Ashland, Talent, Medford, White City, Eagle Point and Shady Cove. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
